meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>sprout</kanji> that <kanji>sprout</kanji>s can thank <vocabulary>germination</vocabulary> for being able to <vocabulary>sprout</vocabulary> nice and big and strong.
readingMnemonic:
This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You haven't learned this reading for 芽 yet, so here's a mnemonic to help you:

When a plant sprouts out of the ground it's still a baby so all it can say is goo goo <reading>ga</reading> ga (が).
